subject: Automobile Racing
organizations: National Assn of Stock Car Auto Racing
lead_paragraph: Justin Allgaier could have coasted to victory under caution — but he ran out of gas, handing a victory to Reed Sorenson at the Nascar Nationwide race in Elkhart Lake, Wis.
snippet: Justin Allgaier could have coasted to victory under caution — but he ran out of gas, handing a victory to Reed Sorenson at the Nascar Nationwide race in Elkhart Lake, Wis.
